attributes.action: Remove Nia Griffith Llanelli MP no confidence
attributes.additional_details: Remove Nia Griffith as she does nothing for Llanelli and doesn't show no support to the local community to what has been going on. Only see her when elections are coming up. The town of Llanelli has lost all faith and confidence in Nia.
attributes.background: Remove Nia Griffith as she does nothing for Llanelli and doesn't show no support to the local community to what has been going on. Only see her when elections are coming up.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for MPs to be removed.
